ElementCopy_event.summary: The copy event fires when the user initiates a copy action through the browser's user interface.

remarks.para: The event's default action is to copy the selection (if any) to the clipboard.
A handler for this event can modify the clipboard contents by calling on the event's property, and cancelling the event's default action using .
However, the handler cannot read the clipboard data.
It's possible to construct and dispatch a synthetic copy event, but this will not affect the system clipboard.
